text: Bowesville is an under construction station on the Trillium Line in Ottawa, Ontario. It is being constructed as part of the Stage 2 O-Train expansion and is scheduled for completion in 2022. The station will consist of two side platforms and is located southeast of the intersection of Bowesville and Earl Armstrong roads. ==References== Category:Trillium Line stations Category:Railway stations scheduled to open in 2022
title: Bowesville station
